title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of C programming language and start your journey into the world of coding.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Master the basics of algorithms and algorithmic problem-solving techniques.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Explore C++ programming in the context of data structures and algorithms.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Get a solid understanding of fundamental data structures and their applications.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Learn object-oriented programming with Python and build efficient, reusable code.

title: Software Engineering
description: Dive into the principles and practices of software engineering for building robust, scalable applications.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Explore cloud computing with Amazon Web Services (AWS) and leverage the power of the cloud.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Learn the essentials of database management using MySQL for efficient data storage and retrieval.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Hone your problem-solving skills with practical exercises and real-world scenarios.
